Magic resistance: %n% for Fimm Warriors and Fianna Fimm
Unlocks mount: Bog Beast
Curse of the Dark Gods
You waste time searching for mere trinkets? True power lies with us fool!
Curse of the Dark Gods
You do nothing, NOTHING! You don't have enough coin? Here, let me thin your ranks for you!
Favour of the Dark Gods
This pleases us, take this gift and bring ruin to the world!
Swirling Mist

Fimir strongholds are seldom seen by outsiders, for they are wreathed in thick mist, a miasma which is magically generated by the Fimir to shield their fortresses from prying eyes, and themselves from the harsh glare of the sun.
This army has gained the favour of the Dark Ones, wreak havoc and they will knit your gaping bloody wounds.
Blessings of the Dark Ones
Passive ability: "Dark Ones Blessing"
Does not pay additional Army Upkeep
From The Mist They Come
We come for your women folk, resistance is futile!
